jobDescription: Company Description: Dematic is a leading supplier of integrated automated technology, software and services to optimize the supply chain. Dematic employs over 6,000 skilled logistics professionals to serve its customers globally, with engineering centers and manufacturing facilities located across the globe. Dematic has implemented more than 4,500 integrated systems for a customer base that includes small, medium and large companies doing business in a variety of market sectors.Headquartered in Grand Rapids, MI, Dematic is a member of KION Group, a global leader in industrial trucks, related services, and supply chain solutions. Across more than 100 countries worldwide, the KION Group designs, builds and supports logistics solutions that optimize material and information flow within factories, warehouses and distribution centers. The company is the largest manufacturer of industrial trucks in Europe, the second-largest producer of forklifts globally, and a leading provider of warehouse automation.  Job Description:Overview: Dematic has an immediate need for a project Mechanical Engineer within the Mobile Automation group located in Holland, MI. The chosen candidate will focus on the design and documentation of automated guided vehicles (AGVs) and associated equipment.This position requires solid knowledge of mechanical engineering principles as well as good time management and task management skills. Education Required:-Minimum 4 year degree in Mechanical Engienering Responsibilites:-Design Documentation/Drawings-Testing Documentation-Supplier and component identification / selection-Provide support for Customer Service and issue resolutionExperience/Skills Preferred:-Experience with Solidworks-Experience in automation equipment, prederably Automated Guided Vehicles-Experience with AutoCAD-Understanding of UL and CE standards-Experience with production documentation-Good communication with other engineering disciplines and manufacturing-Excellent verbal and written communication skills-Experience with MS programs, Word, Excel-Ability to work well within a team environment-Detail oriented-Quality orientedTravel:-Up to 25% (including internaltional)  General Requirements:
